::: {.callout-important}
### Logistics
The Bootcamp ends at 12:45 pm.

You **must** enter via the main (Curtin Road) entrance to Pattee and Paterno Library:

![Main entrance to Pattee and Paterno Libraries](include/img/pattee-paterno-entrance.png){#fig-pattee-paterno}

Breakfast and lunch will be in the periodicals room past Starbucks on the first floor.

The keynote will be in Foster Auditorium.
:::
